name: RackGPT
details: Aggregated detailed documentation from RackN’s GitLab repositories, utilized standard NLP preprocessing methods (lemmatization, truncation, tokenization) to prepare the dataset for training, trained cutting-edge deep learning models such as T5 and GPT, and evaluated the models’ performance via Huggingface’s Transformers package.

Developed a chatbot using Langchain customization to assist users with troubleshooting. The chatbot accesses vector-stored documentation and utilizes OpenAI's API for responses. Aimed to lower expertise barriers and reduce support ticket submissions.
Demonstrated strong communication skills and professionalism by effectively documenting updates, goals, steps, and approach via GitLab.

name: Oil Transportation Route Optimization
details: Leveraging unsupervised learning techniques such as k-means clustering to discern the optimal delivery routes based on factors such as distance, fuel consumption, and delivery time.
Implemented an end-to-end MLOps pipeline for delivery optimization using AWS services such as S3 and SageMaker.

Utilizing state-of-the-art ML algorithms such as KMeans and DBScan to minimize fuel consumption and delivery time of each route, and comparing their performance to select the optimal algorithm for the task.

name: Simmer
details: Designed and developed a modern chatbot UI using Next.js and Tailwind CSS, focused on providing culinary assistance including recipes, meal prep, and nutritional guidance.
Integrated LangGraph to create a multi-step conversational agent capable of calling external tools (e.g., web search) and adapting to user needs over time.

Configured a Dockerized backend with Ollama and Elasticsearch for running local LLMs and persisting chat history. Future integrations include user authentication, profile customization, and session persistence.
Built custom components like floating chat bubbles, dark/light themes, and chat session management, drawing UX inspiration from ChatGPT while tailoring for food-specific use cases.
